Posts.Content: Great news Clementine! Tonight I unwrapped my two newly repaired assets. Surgery was one week ago and this week has been very rough. I've been really questioning myself and my docs. However, as of a few hours ago, they look Mahhhvelous!! I'm very pleased. Whew! So, here's a toast to us and our latest additions! Candace
Posts.Title: Update on "ornaments"
